# RStudio Integration

You can use git and GitHub within RStudio. Via the interface you can stage files, create commits or push and pull from and to remote repositories.

For more info, check out the official [RStudio User Guide on Version Controll](https://docs.posit.co/ide/user/ide/guide/tools/version-control.html)
